>
[Sinew-Shock Serum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=691)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 254 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check with the listed counteract modifier to remove the [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) or [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.
